item.title: EVI INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: EVI INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Services-Personal Services [7200] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 13, 2022 had 24911 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
